body_html: @apaszke Thanks for the reply. I wasn't of course implying to have a single library 😆 . I understand that there are differences but sane easy to remember naming conventions that register immediately to your long term memory are quite helpful to get to speed up with the library. But I do get it, I understand the reason. Thanks!
